Lemma for an alternate version of weak deduction theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2012.)

 Alternate version of ~ dedlema .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-1994.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 7-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2012.)
statement: dedlem0a $p |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ( ( ch -> ph ) -> ( ps /\ ph ) ) ) ) $.
